alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 10 at 1:28AM CST until December 10 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN HENRY COUNTY... At 127 AM CST, a confirmed tornado was located near Texasville, or 9 miles northwest of Abbeville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Scottsboro Crossroads, Lawrenceville, Screamer, and Edwin. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
